snippet: The Solentiname islands, in Lake Nicaragua, are known for their lush primitivist art and for the efforts of Ernesto Cardenal, the priest who started it all.
abstract: Solentiname Islands in Nicaragua are well-known to aficionados of the local artists, who depict the islands as a paradise of impossibly lush flora, exotic birds, distinctive hanging birds' nests and happy lives; visitors find that the paintings are not far off from the truth.
lead_paragraph: The Solentiname islands, in Lake Nicaragua, are known for their lush primitivist art and for the efforts of Ernesto Cardenal, the priest who started it all.

headline.seo: On the Solentiname Islands in Nicaragua, an Eden With Art
headline.main: In Lush Nicaragua, Legacy of a Priest
headline.print_headline: In Lush Nicaragua, Legacy of a Priest
